title: Ladies of Lockington
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Rural women
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Rural women
abstract: Interviews with the ladies who are at the heart of Lockington and their work in the community. Filmed as part of 'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Lockington'.
description: Meet the ladies who are at the heart of Lockington. These passionate and committed women get things done. They network, coordinate, manage and harness the talent that is available to them to improve and enhance the quality of life for all the families of Lockington and surrounding districts.
